title: Carmack: “There’s a bunch that I’m grumpy about” in virtual reality
description: Lonely lecture as a VR avatar is a far cry from last year's "thousands of people" goal

title: New Apple services and apps are rolling out on Windows 11 and Xbox
description: Music for Xbox is here now; Music and TV for Windows will come later.

description: Microsoft says UK relied on Sony's "exaggerated" claims about Call of Duty.

description: TikTok to launch live shopping in the US over the holidays.

description: Federal officials urge Americans to get their boost by Halloween.

description: Big Tech's cross-platform password replacement arrives in the Google ecosystem.

title: Nasal COVID vaccine blows clinical trial, flinging researchers back to the lab
description: The trial used the same vaccine formula as the AstraZeneca vaccine given intramuscularly.

title: Webb captures truly strange set of rings built by massive stars
description: Over the past 120 years, stellar winds have built concentric circles of dust.

title: Pixel Watch review: Beautiful, fast, and way too expensive
description: It could be better, but it might be good enough for a wearables-starved ecosystem.

title: The Polestar 3 SUV will cost $83,900 “loaded,” goes on sale Q4 2023
description: Production of the new EV starts in China in 2023, then South Carolina in 2024.

description: Power of US export curbs could diminish quickly without other nations joining.

title: NASA says the Artemis I mission will be ready to launch in one month
description: Set your alarm for 7 minutes after midnight on November 14.

title: Report: “Thousands” of Intel layoffs planned as PC demand slows and revenues fall
description: Sales of consumer and server CPUs are down as pandemic-era demand slows.

title: Microsoft takes AI image generation mainstream, strolling into ethics minefield
description: Microsoft sidesteps AI-powered art debate, embraces image generation as a tool for creatives.

description: For this refresh, Microsoft works up the courage to remove the headphone jack.

description: Platform is unlikely to reverse decision to block former US president Donald Trump.

title: Roku’s new lights, doorbells, and switches are TV-centered (and very familiar)

description: "We can't force the timeline. It will happen when it happens."

title: After fight vs. FAA, Verizon’s and AT&T’s new spectrum is boosting 5G speeds
